system.novice: Navigator chooses target in range, for Willpower Bonus Minutes, if that target would gain Corruption Points, they gain 1 less (minimum 1). Can only have one instance of this power active at a time, after it ends Navigator makes +0 Toughness Test or gains 1 Fatigue.
system.adept: Navigator can shield a number of targets equal to their Perception Bonus, reducing any Corruption Points gained by 2 (minimum 0).
system.master: Power now lasts for 2x Willpower Bonus Minutes.
